about_the_game:
setting of the story
In the year of the Dog (1910), the ancient empire was in a violent turmoil. The contradictions between peasants and landlords in urban and rural areas, lords and foreigners, tradition and reform were like waves one after another, and each wave was higher than the other. There were frequent civil unrest in various provinces, famine occurred year after year, and crowds of hungry people flowed into this small town that had been closed for thousands of years.

Game features
More suitable for Chinese baby physique story text
True and false hall King: Yuan Hongyun cleverly set a ring scheme Qiao scholar strayed into the chapel
Stare at the truth: You will face the meaning of life, in the upside down world market to see the strange skills brought by foreigners.
Cheese learning explosion: Play a small town scholar to identify everything
No talking: Pretty much

content_descriptors.notes:
There are descriptions of cigarettes in the game.
Like the French writer Victor Hugo, I wanted to express my humanitarian concern for Fantine.
There is no prejudice against her, just a description of her helplessness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: inter(R)Core(TM)i3-370m
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeFoce GTX 760(128MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz 或 AMD A10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Ancient science fiction theme text adventure game - and you will play a scholar who can't get fame because of the abolition of the imperial examination in the world's highest town, and meet two small town scholars who can't get the imperial examination to explore the secrets of the town.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
